description:
Zeel Massage On Demand brings massage therapy to your doorstep when you want it – right away. Never wait or travel for massage again.  

Use the Zeel app to get massage at home, your hotel room, or wherever you are, at any time today or tomorrow between 8 a.m. and 10:30 p.m., any day of the week. Once we get your request, we’ll confirm in minutes and send one of our awesome vetted, licensed, and insured massage therapists to your location with a portable massage table.  

We’ll text you with your massage therapist’s photo, bio and arrival time. Your only task: relax, unwind and enjoy. After your in home massage, Zeel charges a no-surprise, all-inclusive price to your credit card that includes tax and tip.

Zeel Massage On Demand℠ is currently available in New York City and The Hamptons but adding cities frequently. See www.zeel.com/cities for a complete list of available cities and www.zeel.com/about/pricing for pricing.

KEY ADVANTAGES:
* Massage in your home or hotel room when you want it.
* Book as little as an hour beforehand. No need to rearrange your schedule.
* It takes just 30 seconds and a few taps of the app to bring a Zeel Massage Therapist (ZMT) to your door.
* ZMTs bring all necessary equipment, including portable home massage table.  
* Pricing is all-inclusive: you pay one reasonable fee, including tax and tip. 
* You choose massage therapist gender and type of massage (relaxing Swedish or invigorating deep tissue).
* Opt for 60- or 90-minute massage therapy sessions,
* All ZMTs are vetted, licensed, certified, and insured.

Back pain? Neck pain? Both? Exhausted? Stressed? Don’t have time to hunt down a place to book massage?  Then the Zeel Massage On Demand app was made for you. We find massage therapists with great experience and qualifications, and we send them to your home as soon as you want massage therapy – with as little as an hour’s notice.

ZMTs are licensed massage professionals who’ve worked in top hotels, spas and gyms, all personally vetted by Zeel. You can choose a male or female massage therapist, go for a relaxing Swedish massage or an invigorating deep tissue massage, and enjoy either a 60 or 90 minute massage. It’s up to you. And it all happens when you book massage with the Zeel app, in as little as an hour or at the time you choose today or tomorrow.

Whether you want to find a massage therapist to pamper yourself, relieve back pain and neck pain, or just relax and reduce stress, Zeel is here for you. 

ZEEL ACCOLADES:
* "The idea of getting a massage is appealing, and not having to travel makes it very convenient. Well, now there’s a way to make that happen, and it benefits both customer and provider.” – ABC News
* "If you’re tense, stressed out, just feel like getting a massage, it is possible now, same-day.” – Fox Business News
* “...these aren’t the type of massage therapists you’ll find on Groupon, they’re vetted, certified experts.” – TechCrunch
* “Best of the Web 2012” – InStyle
* "Civilization as we know it has officially reached its pinnacle." - Curbed

CONNECT WITH US:
* Email: feedback@zeel.com  
* Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GetZeel
* Twitter: @getzeel
